c74object.name: fl.map~
c74object.digest: Maps values in the input via a given scaling to corresponding output values.
c74object.description: The output size matches the input size. Scaling maps a specified range of values in the input to a specified range of output values. Different modes of scaling are offered. Values may be optionally constrained within the specified ranges.

entry.name: 0. /mode [enum]
entry.description:
Sets the type of output scaling: linear / log / exp - scaling as specified. pow - scale the input range to [0-1], apply the specifiedexponent and then scale to the output range. db / invdb - output / input respectively are set in dB but scaled as gain values. transpose / invtranspose - output / input respectively are set in semitones but scaled as ratios for transposition.
[0] - linear [1] - log [2] - exp [3] - pow [4] - db [5] - invdb [6] - transpose [7] - invtranspose

entry.name: 5. /exponent [double]
entry.description: Sets the exponent for the pow mode.

entry.name: 6. /clip [bool]
entry.description: If true then the output is clipped between the low and high output value.
